amendment.description: To hold Medicare beneficiaries harmless for the increase in the 2007 Medicare monthly part B premium that would otherwise occur because of the 2006 increase in payments under the physician fee schedule.

action.text: Amendment SA 2357 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2357 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 50. Record Vote Number: 287.
